errors.message: 'if' is not followed by whitespace.
'if' is not followed by whitespace.
'if' child has incorrect indentation level 48, expected level should be 12.
'if rcurly' has incorrect indentation level 44, expected level should be 8.
'}' at column 45 should be on the same line as the next part of a multi-block statement (one that directly contains multiple blocks: if/else-if/else, do/while or try/catch/finally).
'else' has incorrect indentation level 0, expected level should be 8.
'else' child has incorrect indentation level 9, expected level should be 12.
Line is longer than 80 characters (found 97).
'else rcurly' has incorrect indentation level 5, expected level should be 8.
